version_description:
• Added PDP address in network widget (thanks Thierryk85 for asking)
• Fixed Dutch translations (thanks Lex for the translation)

• Updated for 2020 iPad Pro with A12Z CPU
• Minor enhancements

• Improved support for new iPhone SE
• Added cache to storage stats (iOS Settings app is not counting cache on the storage stats)
• Fixed Japanese translation - Thanks Katagaki :)

• New iOS14 widgets!
Widgets to put right on your home screen to display all the information you need.
This is a first version, if you have ideas for different widgets, please send them to me at omnistatapp@gmail.com.

• Various iOS14 optimiza

Added support for :
- iPad Air (gen 4)
- iPhone 12 mini
- iPhone 12
- iPhone 12 Pro
- iPhone 12 Pro Max

Added option to always allow location (to allow iOS 14 widgets to read your WiFi network name).
